title: TFW you notice more Order Icons then Chaos ones
body:
http://i.imgur.com/CD1SPCJ.jpg

Yet still aren't sure if she is winning.

http://blog-imgs-64.fc2.com/y/a/r/yaraon/150510-0008230773-1440x810.jpg

I am far more paranoid about this then I should be >->

replies.body:
Just a bit more paranoid.

Perhaps the Chaos are in the silent majority that don't visit the boards. Just a thought there...
Well seeing Yasuo's damn near 70% ban rate I'd like to think people hate him enough to side with Riven just so he doesn't win.
That's also a possibility. Though we'll never know until we see the results now will we?
kehehehe we shall triumph!
Patience, friend.

Depends.
The way I see it I am not taking side of Yasuo or Riven.

I was given the choice chaos and order.
And when it comes to that, I clearly prefer chaos.
I prefer cool sword icon and Annie skin over Vayne skin.

Yes we prefered a burned, destroyed and dead world instead of one of order and progress :D 

/s
We like out chaos in a nice orderly fashion. Non of this actual chaotic chaos. just the orderly structured chaos.
Donald Trump 2k17
this is my hope as well lol
I chose order for the hextech annie chance.
wait order has hextech annie? damn it why do i have to love chaos so much?!? D:
chaos has soulstealer vayne so I mean....
Hextech annie is so much cooler then
I actually play annie and riven so its a win win for me.
i love both skins but i like Annie's best since its blue
I'll be sure to make this as difficult as possible for you ;^)
plus one for saber, and as soon as my internet it back up i will be putting in my good time for the cause
I would have chosen Order regardless of whether Riven or Yasuo got it.....I like angelic stuff. Riven got the angelic skin, so i side with her.
i honestly chose to support order just because Riven's skin looked better...  Being an infernal dark elf just doesn't feel like any universe's version of yasuo...
the edgelords are prevailing :'(
Why do you say that?

that little meter that shows which side is winning
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017
even if it's just by a little bit, the edgelords seem to be winning.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
That looks even to me.
I swapped back to this one after each mission...

Same here.
I actually can't stand these icons, I just use them for missions and then change back to my beloved Piltover. <3
Went Yasuo because he simply looks badass and the VO rocks. Also, he's much less annoying than Riven.
Aren't rewards the same for everyone who participates regardless of which side wins?
Last ARAM I did it was 9 Chaos and 1 Order xD
